=====================================

### F1022-230270 Calorimeter

#### Solicitation Information
----------------------------------------

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4131280030
* **Publication Date**: 2023-08-31
* **Close Date**: 2023-09-26T14:00:00 (Expired)

#### Tender Details
-------------------

* **GSA Classification**: Measuring and Observing and Testing Instruments (41110000)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner en français)
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Evaluation Criteria
------------------------

* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

#### Terms and Conditions
---------------------------

* **End-User Entity**: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Contact Information
-------------------------

* **Contact Name**: Christine Cress
* **Contact Email**: [christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
